website_summaries.verdict: This tool is easy to use and will last a lifetime. Easily one of the best wire cutters on the market for smaller wires.
pros: Cuts wire up to 1/4" thick with ease, and has a comfortable handle that reduces hand cramping and discomfort during repetitive jobs
cons: Jaw opening isn't as wide as it could be due to double-joint system

customer_reviews.title: and cutting ability are amazing. Perfect for chain maille
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and the first pair I bought cut 50,000+ rings before I couldn't use them anymore. I cut 22,000 16g 5/16'' galvanized rings I don't know how many Stainless Steel rings of various sizes but I did go through 2 big rolls of 12g SS, 1 roll of 16g SS, and some other misc. cutting of old fence and wire to send to the scrap yard. The spring, the handles, and cutting ability are amazing. Perfect for chain maille. Check out YouTube to see what they're capable of.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: I think my search for the best cutters is over. I purchased this item to cut hardened solid rings from fishing hooks in order to replace with better rings and I'm amazed at how this tool cuts with precision and ease. I was so impressed that I also bought the 460 bolt cutter (another outstanding cutter). Every part of this tool speaks of precision and quality. The blades keep cutting. I don't see any distortion on the edges after cutting so many times. The blades also meet edge-to-edge precisely so that cuts are consistent. I'm confident this tool will last a long time, and something I might be able to pass on to my kid.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: The quality that you expect from Knipex...  Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bolt cutter is amazing. What a difference from all of the other mini bolt cutters I have used. A typical mini bolt cutter can be almost painful trying to make a cut. These things are unbelievable comfortable. They cut with amazing ease. Even with heavy use I think this cutter will be around for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: EJen

customer_reviews.title: Require quite a bit of effort for cutting fencing
customer_reviews.text: I got these bolt cutters to keep in my back pocket while I am cutting fencing (which I use as tomato plant support cages). They are compact, and they have a spring which returns them to the open position after a cut. The mechanism to hold them closed while not in use seems particularly well thought-out. They do cut through my fencing, but only with quite a bit of effort, so I am going to use a larger bolt cutter for my fencing project. However, I will keep these on hand for smaller projects.
customer_reviews.author: Toivo

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool, works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, quality tool, durable, works as intended, portable, comfortable handles. Though advertised as high leverage, it takes some effort to cut through wires within the maximum cutting range. Though a little pricey, worth the quality and durability of the tool and should give many years of service. Definitely a good value & a good addition to any tool box.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalClear

customer_reviews.title: It is real
customer_reviews.text: When I saw internet's videos on that tool I thought there was some exaggeration. For my surprise that is not the case. I tested it! The single thing I did not saw in the videos is the black paint goes away from the cutter jaws in the place they bite the wire to cut. I guess you have to maintain jaws oiled in order to prevent rust after its use. I liked it a lot. My first real bolt cutter... and works very well. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo Cristo

customer_reviews.title: warm and fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: these bad boys make my jobs faster, take less effort to accomplish the same tasks with my old side cutters, and grabbing for these fills me with the warm and fuzzies, a joy to use. they are used hard, maintained with care, and will be inherited by my children in about the condition in which they were purchased, thats how well built these cutters are. come to think of it, every tool ive purchased from knipex is of the same shkookem design and material quality, very strong, very sexual.
customer_reviews.author: Azza

customer_reviews.title: Move over side-cutters!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it does! It’s like a pocket sized bolt cutter. If you’re like me.......you’ve probably torn up a pair of Side-cutters (on more than one occasion,) trying to cut things you know are just a little too far out of there league ( I have 2 pair that look more like steak knives from years of abuse. You know what I’m talking about.) So far I’m very pleased. We’ll see how they hold up over the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Alan

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: All my tools are Knipex now. It's all about the quality. Compared to other major brands you will pay more up front but long term your tools will outlast the others. Great for quickly cutting small diameter fasteners or pins without buggering up the cutting edges of your Linesman pliers.
customer_reviews.author: WWJ

customer_reviews.title: Snips Your Cutting Worries Away!
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through everything I need it to. Slightly disappointed that the box it was in came basically destroyed but the tool works great. I use this for chicken wire and other fencing along with trimming small branches. Durable and well made. The upgraded grips are a plus but not necessary if your budget doesn’t allow. Look at the cheaper ones because this isn’t a tool to pass over on!
customer_reviews.author: A_Fellow_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: My old mom loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my old mom to do her flower arrangements for old people who died. Her frail old hands couldn't use regular wire cutters. But I will likely by a set for my self because they will chomp through a lot with little force.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Benson

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wire cutter to cut about 30 feet of border fence. It was so easy. I was done and the job which seemed like it was hard, was a pleasure to do. Now I'm looking for more jobs to tackle. GREAT TOOL! GET ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H.

customer_reviews.title: the end result was usually a disgusting mess - these cost a bit more but in ...
customer_reviews.text: These cutters just work - you want to cut stainless wire [snip] done - the evil death cutters these replaced caused a lot of scratches and cuts trying to gnaw through what I was trying to cut, the end result was usually a disgusting mess - these cost a bit more but in the long run cost a lot less in blood - band aids and replacing el cheapo crud cutters every few months - more than happy with these and would recommend to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: makes the cut
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy something like these years ago. I've always used dikes or my bonsai wire cutters to cut wire. Neither of these perform well on bigger or steel wire. These wire cutters do the job with ease. They easily cut both the big copper wire used for bonsais as well as steel wire that I use for various things.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent GHB Addition
customer_reviews.text: A highly recommended addition to our mostly urban terrain GHBs: adding to a Silky saw, SOG Seal Pup, DC4, Gransfors hatchet/file, sillcock key, assorted nails and duck tape.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty cutter
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a heavy duty wire cutter. Something smaller than my other bolt cutters. I probably will not use this to cut thicker wire. I would limit to 14 gauge fencing. I use my small bolt cutter for anything larger. In a pinch, I may use it one day. I really don't want take a chance on denting the cutter head I like the Knipex brand, so I thought this would be a good choice. For my cutting so far, it is working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to do.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for cutting wire. I used it to cut up tomato wire which is tough. The scrap people would not take the wire if not placed in a trash can. As a result it had to be cut up.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Rose

customer_reviews.title: One of those rare products that amaze.
customer_reviews.text: It slices...it dices...it...holy wow did you just cut a drill bit with those? I have done things that are only stupid with my Knipexes and they have 0 notches in the blades for about 5 years. I'm buying a replacement set once I realized I had lost my last pair somehow. This things will cut piano wire like a champ - something most pliers are notched instantly on. Any fencing duties are more than taken care of. Cutting electrical anything is also fantastic. Really, there isn't anything that fits in the jaws that could scare me anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Khan

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but w/spring these smoke regular side cutters
customer_reviews.text: Pricey compared to side cutters but these nearly literally cut everything with ease and with the spring loaded model you can hold this in your fingertips even and do very fine work with heavy cutting capabilities. Fit and finish was amazing and holds up extremely well
customer_reviews.author: Relax Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Best Wire Cutter I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through everything that fits. I'm usng this for cutting jump rings for chainmail and I can go through 2.5 pounds of 14 gauge wire coils (maybe 2500 cuts) in one sitting and my hand never tires. I've barely used the cutter, by chainmail standards, maybe 20,000 cuts but every cut is still as clean as the first. This would easily last a life time if not owned by a chainmailer and might even hold up for a life time for a chainmailer. I couldn't be happier and it's well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great at cutting metal wire + thick plastic
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, cuts VERY easily, edges are clearly very hard and do not dull unless you intentionally abuse them, this is my first pair of bolt cutters but these seem far above average already. I love the spring return + easy locking feature on these as well.
customer_reviews.author: silver king

customer_reviews.title: Best mini cutters
customer_reviews.text: Wish all my tools were this tough. It will handle cutting almost anything you can fit in the open blades, not for hardened steel or live wires obviously. One wish- the jaw capacity was 1/8” wider.
customer_reviews.author: robert jines

customer_reviews.title: Fast and compact!
customer_reviews.text: Cuts 2mm SS Spokes quickly and easily. I like the return spring action, it’s not overwhelming and doesn’t work against you.
customer_reviews.author: T. Eskew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for cutting chain link fencing
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling to cut through chain link fencing using regular wire cutters. The Knipex Cutter cut through the chain link almost as easy as cutting through butter.
customer_reviews.author: Astroguy

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: My best friend and I make floral arrangements occasionally and we needed a good pair of wire cutters. This is the BOMB! I highly recommend these, but hide them from the guys in your house, they’ll steal them! One of the best purchases I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tool at a premium. I highly recommend these they are well made and worth it . Don’t hesitate to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cutter!
customer_reviews.text: Had these in my cart for months until I finally made the purchase. Been using co-workers for a while and finally decided I needed my own. These are great!! Cut way better than side cutters! Definitely a great purchase if you need to cut smaller bolts or cable.
customer_reviews.author: amtm

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool. long ship time
customer_reviews.text: I finally received it. I did not notice that it came from Ireland and it took a month to get here. Good quality cutter and will work well. Package looked like it had been dragged behind the truck. whether here or elsewhere I know not.
customer_reviews.author: Dyna Chrome

customer_reviews.title: Well made and they work as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to trim some chain link fence in my back yard and these were amazing. For perfectly in my hand and they were sturdy enough to clip about 80 feet of thick fencing - great buy!
customer_reviews.author: BerryChowTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The best cutters so far
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of Snap-On pliers and cutters and these Knipex cutters are far superior in every aspect. I use them to cut bolts, nails, wire, sheet metal, plastic and after all this they can still cut paper as if nothing happened. Love the soft-grip (all other Knipex pliers in my possession are soft-grip) The only thing that is not really clear from product description is that these cutters have straight cutting edge. There is another model of basically the same cutters that has a small opening towards the hinge so when cutting something of a larger diameter, it doesn't get pushed forward.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeky

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought to make 50 deer proof tree cages out of 17 strand 12 1/2 gauge fence wire. That's at least 850 cuts with no problems, no wear, and no hand fatigue! Love the padded handles and the spring, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Cuts fishing hooks like they're paper
customer_reviews.text: Use for cutting fish hooks the alternative would be ripping the fish to shreds. Two fish have benefited so far. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wildpack

customer_reviews.title: Built to a standard other tools simply can’t match
customer_reviews.text: I love my Knipex tools as I feel they are some of the best built tools out there. My only fear is losing them. This mini bolt cutter fits my hand perfectly and more than lives up to the “made in Germany” label. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: techie

customer_reviews.title: Cut like buttah
customer_reviews.text: Work phenomenally well, and definitely worth the money. I appreciate the small size, but keep in mind that it limits your ability to cut anything larger than an 1/8”.
customer_reviews.author: kimberley cosman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Cutting
customer_reviews.text: This does well at cutting 12 gauge bolts. Very little effort required to snap them off clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Bennett

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I keep trying to find an inexpensive cable cutter, but not one of the inexpensive ones work, trust me, I've tried. These are not inexpensive, but they work and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Soots

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutters
customer_reviews.text: I cut a lot of 13 ga hardened wire. It worked great. I cut about 200 of them the first day and still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Bearcat

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools working better, longer
customer_reviews.text: Ultimate equipment, works with ease - one is looking forward already for the next cutting job.....! Yes, it is not cheap, but I am expecting it to last for generations, not months. Made in Germany. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: RPB - Houston/TX

customer_reviews.title: Good tool to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: These are a great tool! I do aircraft work, and cutting cotter pins, and heavy safety wire, these make life easier. I like the close lock on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: DougO

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Do a lot of farm fencing
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why I waited to spend the money on them. I love them. Do a lot of farm fencing, has cut my time down and my hands don't feel any fatigue. Cut a lot of #9 wire and they hold up great. Also good for high tensile electric fence! Even bought a second pair for my crew, the wife and 10 year old boy!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: it's knipex....
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for!! This cutters is next level, it just cut so easily. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: I love shopping

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy duty nippers
customer_reviews.text: These are great, easily cutting stainless steel and spring steel strips (boning material for dresses, corsets), that were very hard to cut with my diagonal cutters. They seem accurate and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: M. Luce

customer_reviews.title: These things bring some happiness.hi
customer_reviews.text: These are an absolute must have in the HVAC daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: Last nippers you'll need until you lose them
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate to spend the money on these nippers. They are awesome. Best around. I've bought cheaper imitations, but they don't compare to these.
customer_reviews.author: Loren S.

customer_reviews.title: Oh, German engineering...
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are fantastic. Great leverage and good padding. They are also sharp enough to cut thin cloth even after 1000+ cuts of 16g galvanized steel wire. I bought a pair of cheap Chinese crap first and they shattered after the 3rd cut. I cant recommend these highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: The Nagus

customer_reviews.title: Won't do fencing without my Knipex!
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of fencing on the farm. From barb wire to field fence to electric high tensile wire fencing. I always carried a pair of lineman's pliers along with my fencing pliers. These Knipex cutters are the best I've ever used. They're not cheap, but you get what you pay for & these are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Pendrey

customer_reviews.title: if you need it you'll not be sorry to spend the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. These do everything they are advertised. For super thick cutting or extremely hard material like inconel or very thick rods the cutters with the "notch" might be better. But so far these cut everything I need them to WAY better than my lineman's or my KOBALT bolt cutter POS from the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: cschizzle olmater

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Tool
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Good quality, light weight, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Need it
customer_reviews.text: Typical knipex quality, excellent fit and finish. Using this cutter may help extend the life of more pricy pliers in your arsenal which may not be ideal for severing metal screws and such (seems like it can take the abuse)
customer_reviews.author: Abu Nazir

customer_reviews.title: Best quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Best quality tool. All of my pliers are Knipex for a good reason. A poor mechanic can’t afford cheap tools. By these and be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Technik-Guru

customer_reviews.title: Bulletproof construction.
customer_reviews.text: Super solid cutters as you would expect from Knipex. I've never used any of their tools that were anything less than perfect. They should last a lifetime. I've cut through bolts with these that other dikes couldn't even mark and when done, these cutters showed no sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kimtastic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used much but like most Knipex pliers these are just about perfect. The lock is a bit cumbersome but it does the job. Cutting through wire and nails is effortless.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion, good tools ain’t cheap and cheap tools ain’t good.
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is top notch. As a firefighter, I use this tool to cut electrical service meter can locks to access and remove the meter can which kills the power to residential structures. Due to the rise in utility theft, our local utility company has increased the security measures on electric meters.
customer_reviews.author: james E. Baity Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cutting Welded Wire Fence
customer_reviews.text: Needed to cut short segments of welded wire fence (approx 14ga). Bought based on reviews. Great fit in hand and very easy to cut. No deformation....like a hot knife through butter.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Small than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very small, and didn't suitethe purpose I got it for, so I returned the product. Jaws didn't open wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Been using it every week for a year now and it doesn’t seem to have dulled. Ergonomic. SO much better than the versions you find at the hardware store!
customer_reviews.author: Milton Carl

customer_reviews.title: Like cutting 5 sheets of paper w/scissors
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 100+ products from Amazon, but this is my first amazon review. I'm a saltwater fisherman looking for bolt cutters that can easily cut thru fishing hooks. I just received these bolt cutters, and they cut thru my big hooks so easily, that I'm ordering them again for my dad. Best hook cutters ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is exactly what I was looking for. It does the job and as a woman I can now cut through thicker liners and other object with my job with one hand. Used to struggle with regular dykes and other snips but these are truly a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Leasor

customer_reviews.title: Farmer loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Son in law, loves this item. He wanted it for Christmas and had been watching youtube videos about it. I never knew a simple tool would get him excited. Apparently, we went straight out and started repairing wire fencing that night. Ha! He's a farmer, so it must be a unique and needed item.
customer_reviews.author: Anirta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bug out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tool to cut barb wire or metal fence wire. I keep this tool in my BOB as a just in case tool. I cut some heavy wire as a test before putting in my bag as a permanent tool. Handles should be another inch longer for better bite. However the weight is nice and they do work. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: tony corgliano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, cuts very good without much force. Very good for the price. Cuts thick wire like fencing like butter
customer_reviews.author: Hexs

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and did the job easily and effortlessly!!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Karman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm....im a welder and sometimes i have to do a repair with 1/8 inch filler rod..so i needed someting that can cut and snip the rod
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these cutters for a few weeks now and they are the best on the market in my opinion. I use them daily as I am a welder and clip my tig wire over 100 times a day. Clips 1/8” wire like butter and haven’t seemed to dull after over 1000 cuts. I would reccomend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: logan quincy prange

customer_reviews.title: pretty much anything unless it's HSS or
customer_reviews.text: slammed through steel, stainless, pretty much anything unless it's HSS or titanium
customer_reviews.author: Chalen Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Best cutter you can buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cutter. For those game fishermen out there, it slices through even the largest fishing hooks like butter. Unfortunateky, I was unable to locate the Knipex model with the lanyard clip; so I fashioned a crude substitute out of paracord.
customer_reviews.author: T. K.

customer_reviews.title: Yes...They Cut!
customer_reviews.text: Makes cutting wire and working around the ranch a breeze. They cut well and hold up to a ton of abuse. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: UFOCOP

customer_reviews.title: Knipex is a great tool manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: These will easily last a lifetime. all knipex products are amazing. cant go wrong with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I do alot of fencing. these are indispensable for ...
customer_reviews.text: I do alot of fencing. these are indispensable for wire cutting. 2 other people bought these after using mine. your hands will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JDonley

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Cutters
customer_reviews.text: All Knipex tools I've used are great. Feel great in the hand and cut smoothly. Easier on the hands than dikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, and beats breaking out the 2-handed cutter.
customer_reviews.text: Just excellent for many tasks. Gets through a 16d common nail pretty easily, with one hand. Prefer these for many jobs, rather than breaking out the 2 handed bolt cutters. Fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stefflerock

customer_reviews.title: Husband says " they work pretty slick".
customer_reviews.text: Hubby wanted me to order them.....He said he likes the way they feel in his hand and the spring loaded feature. He's using it for crimping something that has to do with fishing. Says " they work pretty slick" and he likes them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: LwosTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Superior cutters
customer_reviews.text: Knipex quality. They feel solid, have a good finish and cut right through wire that dulled my cheap diagonal cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Bicycle

customer_reviews.title: TIG welders best friend.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, right up there with Klines. Cuts through 1/8" TIG wire one handed with ease. Make sure to place it all the way into the back of the jaws to get a good easy cut.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: These are the best I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are the best I've ever used. A must if you need to cut hooks to properly release a fish.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for a friend & it's the 3rd ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend & it's the 3rd pair Ive bought. Cuts through about anything; I haven't worn out of my two pairs. Knipex makes some of the highest quality hand tools I've used. I'm a machinist & part time mechanic for cars/trucks/CNC machinery. for the last 11 years. Well worth the money. Ed
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made on Amazon. These cutters look nice and are well made (manufactured in Germany) and had no problem cutting 12.5-gauge woven wire (outdoor utility fence). My wife has also borrowed these cutters from me to use on her upholstery projects. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty

customer_reviews.title: No issues still cuts wire like the day i got them
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for about a month now. No issues still cuts wire like the day i got them. Will cut 5/32 Stainless tig wire. Best cutters i have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Abel

customer_reviews.title: Best Hook Cutters on The Market
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheaper pair of cutters before I switched to these. What a difference! These babies cut hooks like butter! A must have for any musky fisherman
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cliver

customer_reviews.title: I believe this tool made in Germany
customer_reviews.text: Because of American's Stores full of Chinese garbage I have to buy German tools which are greatly overvalued!
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must have for a scaffold/concrete form builder.
customer_reviews.text: As a Union Carpenter I build scaffolding quite a bit cuts 9 wire like butter perfect tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: John Pastor Jr

customer_reviews.title: great for fence work
customer_reviews.text: We are in the cattle business so build and tear down a lot of barbed wire fence. These cutters not only work good for cutting the barbed wire, they are great for cutting the old clips off of T posts. Handy for electric fence jobs too.
customer_reviews.author: Ranch Hand

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Irwin German line diagonal cutters
customer_reviews.text: Beats the Irwin German diagonal cutters by a good margin. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kesler

customer_reviews.title: Happy cutting everyone.....
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cutters, this is my first tool made by Knipex and the quality of the tool is better than anything I have seen in a long time. I cut through a brake cable in two spots and had it removed in 60 seconds. Normally would've used my cheap and much larger bolt cutters.
customer_reviews.author: David V

customer_reviews.title: Very poor finish
customer_reviews.text: The tool's black finish was chipped after trying to cut a 304L 3mm stainless steel screw. Also, the grinding marks on the top of the blades isn't clean and symmetric. Not what I was expecting from Knipex.
customer_reviews.author: Shim

customer_reviews.title: great cutters
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool! Cut through some nasty barbed wire and no bigger than a pair of reg. wire cutters (8" long). My farmer brother immediately purchased a pair when he saw mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting TIG wire
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely handy tool for welders that clip filler rod a lot. This cuts through 5/32 stainless rod just fine. I like these a lot better than my Kleins I used for so long.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: If it fits in the jaws, it will cut it. one handed operation.
customer_reviews.text: If it fits in the jaws, it will cut it. one handed operation. Excellent tool.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Great tools and never had any issues with any Knipex ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Great tools and never had any issues with any Knipex brand tool!
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. I use them for clipping 12 and 14 ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I use them for clipping 12 and 14 gauge wire. Really comfortable grips and no fatigue. After testing them out when fortifying my chicken run I ordered a second pair for my dad for fathers day.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: A lot easier on your hand and durable than what I’ve previously used , I just wish they were a quarter inch or so bigger at the head
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Buy these for chain mail crafting
customer_reviews.text: I use for 16 gauge stainless steel chain mail wire. These are phenomenal. I used to buy new clippers every few weeks. These are still strong after a few weeks. Costs a bit more but worth it
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Solid cutters
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool. I wish I had more opportunities to use them. They cut with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gramling

customer_reviews.title: 10,000 cuts and still going.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I bought these for making chain mail rings so by hand. They have survive a 1/4 mile spoil of 14ga galvanized wire.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cutters work great and are made to last. I am extremely pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ruthy

customer_reviews.title: Kinda weak in a way
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but not as heavy duty as I was anticipating
customer_reviews.author: DJP

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for when you cannot get a better grip.
customer_reviews.author: T. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: BEST WIRE-CUTTERS EVER MADE!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these wire cutters to cut baling wire on hay bales. These are awesome wire-cutters!!! My weak hands have no trouble at all, will buy another as a gift for our barn manager as he was envious. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: AR72704

customer_reviews.title: Another great Knipex product.
customer_reviews.text: For us, the knipex 71 12 200 is perfect for cutting lengths of lacing (2mm mild steel) wire, for tying netting onto steel posts. The spring just makes the job just that little bit easier than using our favourite pliers, the knipex 71 01 200. As I have stated in a review for the 71 01 200, DO NOT twist the pliers while cutting, as you will chip the hardened jaws. The leverage design will make cutting wire a breeze. But as with the other model we use, these are great pliers for 2.5mm high tensile wire and will cut 4mm (8 gauge) mild steel wire without much effort.
customer_reviews.author: J Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Knipex makes the best wire cutters around
customer_reviews.text: No doubt about it, Knipex makes the best wire cutters around. No other brand compares to the quality that these have. I bought them for the shop at work and they are totally loving them.
customer_reviews.author: PATTEMELT

product_meta.title: KNIPEX Tools 71 12 200, Comfort Grip High Leverage Cobolt Cutters with Opening Lock and Spring
product_meta.description: With precision cutting edges for soft and hard wire as well as piano wire. Cuts bolts, nails, rivets, etc. Up to ø 5, 2 mm. Cutting edges additionally induction hardened, cutting edge hardness approx. 64 HRC.
feature_bullets: Opening spring with locking device integrated in the handles for comfortable working and secure transport
uts components like bolts, nails, rivets, etc. up to 5.2 mm dia
Exceptional cutting performance with minimum effort because of new lever action design
Cutting edges additionally induction hardened, cutting edge hardness approx 64 hrc
